resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76308</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76308</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-a55c-4152-2abb-e62489aa5085#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Ludovico Caracci: Zsuzsanna és a vének, 1616, Magángyűjtemény, Bologna, 146x116 cm, Olaj, vászon.</string>
            <string language="en">Ludovico Caracci: Susanne and the elders, 1616, private collection, Bologna, 146x116 cm, oil, canvas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ludovico Caracci: Susanne und die Ältesten,
1616, private Ansammlung, Bologna, 146x116 Zentimeter, Öl, Segeltuch.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ludovico Caracci : Susanne et les aînés, 
1616, collection privée, Bologna, 146x116 centimètre, huile, toile.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ludovico Caracci: Susanne e as pessoas 
idosas, 1616, coleção confidencial, Bolonha, 146x116 cm, óleo, 
lona.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ludovico Caracci: Susanne ed i elders, 
1616, accumulazione riservata, Bologna, 146x116 centimetro, olio, tela
di canapa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ludovico Caracci: Θ*Σuσαννε και οι 
υπερήλικες, 1616, ιδιωτική συλλογή, Μπολόνια, 146x116 εκατ.,
πετρέλαιο, καμβάς.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ludovico Caracci: Susanne y las ancianos, 
1616, colección privada, Bolonia, 146x116 centímetro, aceite, lona.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Caracci festménye azt a pillanatot ábrázolja, amikor a vének meglesik, s megpróbálják rábeszélni Zsuzsannát, aki meztelen, fiatal nőként jelenik meg, a helyzetet nem éppen helytelenítve.</string>
            <string language="en">Caracci’s painting represents the moment when the elders watch and try to persuade Susanne, who appears as a naked, young woman and does not disapprove the situation.   </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ószövetségi jelenet,  Zsuzsanna,  vének,  rábeszélés,  erotika,  Ludovico Caracci,  Caracci,  </string>
            <string language="en">scene from the Old Testament, Susanne, elders, persuasion, erotic, Ludovico Caracci,  Caracci,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Caracci?s Anstrich stellt den Moment, wenn die Ältesten 
überwachen und versuchen, um Susanne zu überzeugen, das als blankes 
erscheint, junge Frau dar und mißbilligt nicht die Situation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La peinture de Caracci?s représente le moment quand les 
aînés observent et essayent pour persuader Susanne, qui apparaît en
tant que nu, la jeune femme et ne désapprouve pas la situation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pintura de Caracci?s representa o momento quando as 
pessoas idosas prestam atenção e o tentam para persuadir a Susanne, 
que aparece como um despido, a mulher nova e não disapprove a 
situação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La pittura di Caracci?s rappresenta il momento quando i 
elders guardano e provano per persaudere Susanne, che compare come un 
nudo, la donna giovane e non disapprova la situazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ζωγραφική Caracci?s αντιπροσωπεύει τη στιγμή όταν
προσέχουν οι υπερήλικες και προσπαθούν να πείσουν τη Susanne, η
οποία εμφανίζεται ως γυμνή, νέα γυναίκα και δεν αποδοκιμάζει την
κατάσταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La pintura de Caracci?s representa al momento cuando las 
ancianos miran e intentan para persuadir Susanne, que aparece como 
descubierto, a mujer joven y no desaprueba la situación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Szene vom alten Testament, Susanne, Älteste, Überzeugung, 
erotisch, Ludovico Caracci, Caracci,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">scène du vieux testament, Susanne, aînés, persuasion, 
érotique, Ludovico Caracci, Caracci,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cena do testament velho, Susanne, pessoas idosas, persuasion, 
erotic, Ludovico Caracci, Caracci,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scena dal vecchio Testamento, Susanne, elders, persuasione, 
erotic, Ludovico Caracci, Caracci,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σκηνή από την παλαιά διαθήκη, Susanne, υπερήλικες, 
πειθώ, ερωτική, Ludovico Caracci, Caracci,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">escena del viejo testamento, Susanne, ancianos, persuasión, 
erótica, Ludovico Caracci, Caracci,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        <metaMetadata>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
